title: Ticket #1590: delegation of rfc proxies fails in file transfer
description:
The GSI function globus_gsi_proxy_handle_set_is_limited() contains a bug that causes delegation of rfc proxies to fail. This causes attempts to delegate a proxy in Condor's file transfer object to fail. Delegations only fail when using GSI from Globus 5.x, thus Condor 7.4 is unaffected.

A bug report with patch has been submitted to the Globus team. It can be found at http://bugzilla.globus.org/globus/show_bug.cgi?id=7093. The patch should be applied to the version of Globus built for Condor.

A work-around is to set DELEGATE_JOB_GSI_CREDENTIALS to false, causing proxies to be copied rather than delegated. This is insecure if encryption isn't enabled.
